common.welcome_message: Welcome to the tax consultation platform
common.description: Modern platform for fast and efficient tax queries
common.get_started: Ready to get started? Explore our complete documentation and begin integrating the API into your projects

features.title: Main features
features.api_capabilities: What can you do with our API?
features.api_description: Query tax information through our REST API

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.subtitle: Complete guide to integrate and use our API
documentation.base_url_description: All requests must be made to the following URL:
documentation.exact_search_description: 100% match of the sent value. The parameter must exactly match the value stored in the database, without extra uppercase/lowercase letters or spaces.
documentation.partial_search_description: Flexible search (LIKE) that allows partial matches. The entered value can be found anywhere in the stored text, ideal for searches by name or activity.
documentation.rnc_description: Specific RNC number of the taxpayer
documentation.start_date_description: Start date of operations. You can send a single value (YYYY-MM-DD) for exact match or an array of two dates [from, to] to filter by range.
documentation.message_field: Descriptive message of the search result
documentation.next_field: URL of the next page (null if it's the last)
documentation.prev_field: URL of the previous page (null if it's the first)
documentation.data_field: Array with the RNC records found (maximum 100 per page)
documentation.http_404: The requested resource does not exist
documentation.note: This API is in active development. To get the most up-to-date information about new endpoints and features, regularly consult this documentation.
documentation.search_active_by_date: Search active taxpayers by date range
documentation.search_active_with_name: Search active companies with "company" in the name
documentation.search_active_by_range: Search active taxpayers registered between 2020 and 2024

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Connecting the Dominican tax future with modern technology and transparency
about.why_developed_text: ConsultaRNC was born from the need to modernize and simplify access to tax information in the Dominican Republic. Traditionally, consulting RNC (National Taxpayer Registry) data required manual processes, and although DGII offers a complete web service, our API facilitates the programmatic integration of this data
about.automation_description: Eliminate manual processes and reduce tax information consultation time from hours to seconds
about.accessibility_description: Provide 24/7 access to updated RNC data for developers, companies and integrated systems
about.standardization_description: Create a consistent and structured format for tax information that facilitates integration with different systems
about.transparency_description: Facilitate tax information verification quickly and reliably
about.innovation_description: Drive the development of new applications and services that efficiently leverage tax data
about.conclusion_text: This API represents a step towards the digitization of the Dominican tax sector, offering modern tools that benefit both the public and private sectors, promoting efficiency and transparency in processes related to tax information
about.who_we_are_text: We are developers passionate about technology, committed to offering innovative and easy-to-implement solutions that generate a positive impact on Dominican society. We are motivated by curiosity and the constant search for learning, transforming ideas into tools that simplify people's lives. We firmly believe in collaborative work and in the power of the community to drive the creation of quality software
about.commitment_text: Our commitment is to continuously improve and maintain this API, optimizing access to tax information for the Dominican developer community while continuing to develop new solutions that drive the growth and modernization of the country's technological ecosystem
about.contact_text: We are here to help you. If you have any questions about our services or want to collaborate with the project, don't hesitate to contact us
about.description: This is a tax consultation platform developed to facilitate access to fiscal information quickly and efficiently
about.mission: Our mission is to provide easy and reliable access to tax information

footer.developed_by: Developed with ❤️ for the Dominican Republic by
footer.disclaimer: This platform is for informational use only and has no official relationship with DGII
